title: S5 Ep16: How Fox News inspired vaccine hesitancy
itunes:title: How Fox News inspired vaccine hesitancy
description: At the height of the Covid-19 pandemic, some cable news hosts cast doubt on the effectiveness of vaccines. Matteo Pinna tells Tim Phillips about his research on the impact of Fox News on vaccination rates.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
